sense.def:
A substance
je tisto, kar tvori stvari, bodisi v trdi, praškasti bodisi v tekoči obliki.

seg.quote: He discovered a substance called phosphotase.
We try to remove the harmful substances from cigarettes.

sense.def:
Izraz
substance
lahko uporabljamo za vse, česar se lahko dotaknemo, ne pa tudi za tisto, kar lahko samo vidimo, slišimo ali si predstavljamo.

seg.quote: They had no more substance than shadows.

sense.def:
The substance of what someone says
je ključna stvar, ki jo nekdo poskuša povedati.

seg.quote: The substance of their talk is condensed into a paragraph.

sense.def:
Substance
je tudi to, da je nekaj pomembno.

seg.quote: There isn't anything of real substance in her book.
